references.paper_title: Exact matrix completion via convex optimization
references.reason: This paper introduces the use of convex optimization for matrix completion, which is foundational to the concept of nuclear norm regularization used in this paper.

references.paper_title: Fast maximum margin matrix factorization for collaborative prediction
references.reason: This paper provides an efficient method to solve nuclear norm regularized matrix factorization problems, which inspired the method used in this work to make Jacobian nuclear norm regularization computationally tractable.

references.paper_title: The optimal hard threshold for singular values is 4/√3
references.reason: This paper determines the optimal hard threshold for singular value shrinkage, which is relevant to the denoising application discussed in this paper.
This paper extends the previous work to study more general shrinkage policies, providing theoretical background for the denoising application.

references.paper_title: Oscillating Patterns in Image Processing and Nonlinear Evolution Equations
references.reason: This book introduces the Rudin-Osher-Fatemi (ROF) model for image denoising, which is used as a validation problem for this paper's method.
